identity.name: Kamch Aam Parikshan
identity.tone: Modern Ayurveda - Fusion of Ancient Wisdom & Digital Clarity
identity.description: A vibrant, modern health assessment tool that bridges traditional Ayurvedic diagnosis with contemporary digital design. It avoids the dusty, beige stereotypes of Ayurveda in favor of fresh greens, turmeric oranges, and clean typography.

rules: Use Playfair Display for all H1, H2, H3 headings to evoke trust and tradition.
Use Manrope for all body text, UI elements, and data displays for maximum readability.
Overlines/Labels must be uppercase with wide tracking (tracking-widest).

usage: Primary (Deep Forest Green): Main buttons, active states, key headings.
Background: Off-white/Sage tint (Never pure white #FFFFFF, use #F9FAFB).
Text: Charcoal (#1F2937) for body, Deep Green (#1A4D2E) for headings.
Gradients: Minimal usage. Only subtle 'glows' behind hero images.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain or noise overlays on solid color backgrounds to add depth.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md with bg-white/80 for sticky headers and modal overlays.

landing_page.description: Asymmetrical grid mixing hero text, herbal imagery, and yoga visuals.

assessment_form.description: Single column, centered card layout to reduce cognitive load.

results_page.description: Grid of cards displaying score, interpretation, and specific advice categories.

admin_panel.description: Sidebar navigation + Dense data table area.

cards.style: bg-white border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific color palette provided.
3. BUILD LANDING: Use the 'Tetris Grid' layout. Do not make a generic bootstrap hero.
4. BUILD FORM: Implement the 14-question logic with auto-scoring. Use a progress bar.
5. BUILD RESULTS: The result page must be visually rich. Use icons for Dincharya, Rutucharya, etc.
6. BUILD ADMIN: Secure login (admin_kamch). Table must support sorting and CSV export.
8. CONTACT: Display 'Kamch Consultancy' details prominently on the result page.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Use 2x more whitespace than you think is necessary.
Animations should be 'springy' and 'smooth', not linear.
